```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

```


```{r}

demo <- read.csv("csv_files/demographics_build_table.csv")

veteran_count = 31252 # from vets.csv

```

```{r}

# Make blank tibble to bind sections
demographics <- structure(list(age = NA, sex = NA, race = NA, 
                               ethnicity = NA, marital = NA, dwelling = NA, 
                               priority = NA, homeless = NA, chronic = NA, 
                               mental = NA), class = "data.frame")

```

```{r}

for (i in 2:4){

  d <- demo[[i]]
  
  N <- ceiling( (d[1] / 5400878) * veteran_count )
  
  df <- tibble(id = 1 : N)
  
  # Age
  c <- c(rep("18 - 44", d[2] * N),
        rep("45 - 65",  d[3] * N),
        rep("65 plus",  d[4] * N) )
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, age = sample(c))
  
  
  # Sex
  c <- c(rep("Male",  d[5] * N),
        rep("Female", d[6] * N))
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, sex = sample(c))
  
  
  # Race
  c <- c(rep("Black", d[7] *  N),
         rep("White", d[8] *  N),
         rep("Asian", d[9] *  N),
         rep("AIAN",  d[10] *  N),
         rep("NHPI",  d[11] * N),
         rep("Other", d[12] * N) )
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, race = sample(c))
  
  
  # Ethnicity
  c <- c(rep("Hispanic",     d[13] *  N),
         rep("Not Hispanic", d[14] *  N),
         rep("Unknown",      d[15] *  N))
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, ethnicity = sample(c))
  
  
  # Marital
  c <- c(rep("Single",  d[16] *  N),
         rep("Married", d[17] *  N),
         rep("Unknown", d[18] *  N))
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, marital = sample(c))
  
  
  # Dwelling
  c <- c(rep("Rural",        d[19] *  N),
         rep("Urban",        d[20] *  N),
         rep("Highly Rural", d[21] *  N))
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, dwelling = sample(c))
  
  
  # Priority Group
  c <- c(rep("No Service Disability", d[22] *  N),
         rep("Low Income",            d[23] *  N),
         rep("Low Disability",        d[24] *  N),
         rep("High Disability",       d[25] *  N))
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, priority = sample(c))
  
  
  # Homeless
  c <- c(rep("Homeless", d[26] *  N),
         rep("Not Homeless", (1 - d[26]) *  N) )
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, homeless = sample(c))
  
  
  # Chronic
  c <- c(rep("1-2 Conditions", d[27] *  N),
         rep("3-4 Conditions", d[28] *  N),
         rep("5+ Conditions",  d[29] *  N) )
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, chronic = sample(c))
  
  
  # Mental Health
  c <- c(rep("Mental Health", d[30] *  N),
         rep("Not Mental Health", (1 - d[30]) *  N) )
  if (length(c) < N) {
    c <- append(c, sample(c, N - length(c)))
  }
  df <- cbind(df, mental = sample(c))

  df <- df %>% select(-id)
  
  demographics <- rbind(demographics, df)
  
  rm(df)
  
}

```


```{r}

write_csv(demographics, "csv_files/demographics.csv")

```
